      public static void validateTicketId(Integer id) throws NullValidationException, BoundValidationException
      Validates ticket id
      Parameters:
      id - ticket id
      Throws:
      NullValidationException - if ticket id is null
      BoundValidationException - if ticket id is less than or equals to zero

      public static void validateTicketPrice(Float price) throws BoundValidationException, NullValidationException
      Validates a ticket price being greater than zero
      Parameters:
      price - ticket price
      Throws:
      BoundValidationException - if ticket price is less than or equal to zero
      NullValidationException - if ticket price is null

      comment - ticket comment
      Throws:
      NullValidationException - if ticket comment is null

      Validates ticket instance
      Parameters:
      ticket - ticket instance
      Throws:
      BoundValidationException - if some fields are out of bound
      NullValidationException - if some non-null fields are null
      CannotBeEmptyException - if some non-empty fields are empty
